body_html: You should leave device_count set to 1 for CPU, but if you want to limit the thread count you need to set intra_op_parallelism_threads as well as inter_op_parallelism_threads. You should probably move the discussion to stackoverflow if you need further advice about this, since github issues are for bug reports and feature requests.
body_text: You should leave device_count set to 1 for CPU, but if you want to limit the thread count you need to set intra_op_parallelism_threads as well as inter_op_parallelism_threads. You should probably move the discussion to stackoverflow if you need further advice about this, since github issues are for bug reports and feature requests.
body: You should leave device_count set to 1 for CPU, but if you want to limit the thread count you need to set intra_op_parallelism_threads as well as inter_op_parallelism_threads. You should probably move the discussion to stackoverflow if you need further advice about this, since github issues are for bug reports and feature requests.
